text: Freckled Max and the Spooks () is a Czechoslovak/West German recut of the series Frankenstein's Aunt into a 96-minute film. ==Story== The film is based on the Allan Rune Pettersson book Frankenstein's Aunt, but with several changes. Similar to the book, Aunt Hannah comes to Victor Frankenstein, but rather with the aim of finding a bride for her nephew so that there can be "little Frankensteins" in the family. However, Frankenstein is too busy for this.
